summary: This Mod Adds All Of The Spells In Skyrim Including DlCS
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=4]This Mod Adds All The Spells Or Spell Tomes In SKYRIM Including DLCS [/size]
[u][size=5][center]How To USE[/center][/size][/u][/i][/b][list]
[*][size=5][b][i]Just Extract The files to (skyrim/Data) or whatever your game folder name[/i][/b][/size]
[/list][b][i][size=5]is just extract it in the Data folder Then open Your Game And Then Open The Console Using The Button (`) In QWERTY Keyboard or (2) Using AZERTY Keyboard (Not Sure About The AZERTY) Then Type (Bat KareemSpells) Then Press (Enter Key) Then You Will Have All Spells Added Or Type (Bat KareemTomes) To Add Them As Books To learn (Spell Tomes) You Can Also Remove Them All By Typing (Bat Kareemremovespells) Or (Bat KareemRemoveTomes)[/size]
[size=5][u][center]Important[/center][/u]
F[/size][size=5]inish The quest line Before Using It to prevent problems with the quests
[/size][size=6][u]Notes
[/u]
[/size][b][i][size=5]No need To install The dlcs It Won't Be problem [/size]
[/i][/b][size=6]
[/size]


[size=6]ENJOY[/size][size=5] [/size][size=5]
[/size][/i][/b][b][i] [/i][/b][b][i]
[/i][/b][size=5][b][i][list]
[/list]
[/i][/b][/size]
author: Assassinkareem
